subject: RE: [junit] Unsupported major.minor version 49.0 in junit 4.0
msgSnippet: Junit 4 needs Java 5 - most prominently, it now uses annotations to find test methods. Google Junit 4 for more information. Junit 3.8.x can be used with Java
messageBody:
Junit 4 needs Java 5 - most prominently, it now uses annotations to find
test methods. Google "Junit 4" for more information.

Junit 3.8.x can be used with Java versions before 5.

Cheers, Ilja
